Alias.name: doors
Alias.script:
local dir = matches[4] or ""
switch({ ["op"] = function() send("_open " .. dir) end, ["cl"] = function() send("_close " .. dir) end, ["bl"] = function() send("_block " .. dir) end, ["ba"] = function() send("_bash " .. dir) end, ["br"] = function() send("_break " .. dir) end, ["ul"] = function() send("_unlock " .. dir) end, ["lo"] = function() send("_lock " .. dir) end, ["pi"] = function() send("_pick " .. dir) end, ["kn"] = function() send("_knock " .. dir) end, ["ro"] = function() send("_rock " .. dir) end, }):case(matches[2])
